name: Arsombie
description:
A game for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

  • Playing in full screen recommended.

Someone thought that an arson was a good idea to get rid of the zombies, but it's getting out of control!

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/FranciscOntV/gmtk2020ooc

Feel free to peek into the code.
